title: Helga's Dowry: A Troll Love Story
description: Helga, a troll, must somehow acquire a dowry with which to marry or, by the god Odin’s command, be doomed to wander the earth forever. “Richly colored pictures capture the droll humor of [Helga’s] clever, determined fight to garner impressive riches.”-- Booklist
author: Tomie dePaola
